detaileddescription.para: String containing the CVS revision. Read out via reflection!

parameterdescription.para: destination file name or destination path (filename then taken from source)
destination file name or destination path (filename then taken from source)
start offset of file to copy (0 is begin of file)

detaileddescription.para: Extract file name from a given path+filename.
Adds a subdir to a given dir and returns the resulting dir.
Makes an URL nice by bringing it into a normalized (i.e. convenient) form.

parameterdescription.para: the separator to remove duplicates of

detaileddescription.para: Removes duplicate separators from an URL.

parameterdescription.para: name of directory including file name

detaileddescription.para: Deletes a directory from disk, also if it is non-empty.
Loads a jar file and returns a class loader to access the jar's classes.

parameterdescription.para: the full jar file name, e.g.: C:/jgap/lib/ext/ashcroft.jar

simplesect.para: ClassLoader the class loader with which to access the loaded classes, e.g. by <classloader>.loadClass(<classname including package>), e.g.: cl.loadClass("com.thoughtworks.ashcroft.runtime.JohnAshcroft");

detaileddescription.para: Retrieve the manifest included in the given jar.

simplesect.para: Manifest included in the given jar
version the jar file is working with (or version of the JGAP library in case the file is the JGAP library)
version of the module represented by the jar

version the jar file is working wit (or version of the JGAP library in case the file is the JGAP library)

detaileddescription.para: Converts an ordinary file name into a jar filename that can be used with JarClassLoader.
Creates a directory, and if necessary, any of its parent directories.

parameterdescription.para: name of the dir to create

detaileddescription.para: Returns the files within a directory that match a given pattern. No directories are returned.
Contains helper functions related to the file system.
